column7: With a focus on problem-based learning, students will design lesson plans and curriculum around a complex human issue. Students will have hands-on experiences teaching in actual classrooms as these lessons will be taught in local schools. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTE 203 and ARTE 204; Art education majors only.
column9: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTE 203 and ARTE 204; Art education majors only.
column11: A student registered in one or more Art & Design course(s) exhibiting this message, will be assessed a $95 facility use fee once each term.
